me.dags.DaFlightManager.API

Class DaFlightMessenger

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.dags.DaFlightManager.DaFlightMessenger

  • public class DaFlightMessenger
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles out-bound messages (Server to Client) on the 'DaFlight' plugin channel.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DaFlightMessenger(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin)
      Create an instance of the DaFlight Messenger
